text:
Avdotya's piercing gaze captivates Razumihin.  
Pulcheria whispers, anxiety etched on her face.  
‘Nothing would induce me to go.’  

---  

Razumihin fidgets, urgency in his tone.  
‘You’ll spoil everything! Come out on the stairs!’  

Pulcheria shakes her head, resolute.  
‘I can’t leave him like that!’

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Razumihin urges Pulcheria Alexandrovna to leave Raskolnikov alone for the night to avoid further irritation.
